about_the_game:
DNAXCAT VR is a crucial part of DNAXCAT Metaverse.
On this cloud square, there are many little monsters will interactive with you.
We suggest all friends who have seen animation of DNAxCAT to download and play.
In the future, we'll keep refining and developing systems including plots, guilds, territory, forging, collecting, and battle. Moreover, the animation series will be used as the key of storyline

Following basic functions are included in free version.
1. Voice chat in online gaming.
2. Running, Jumping and Rainbow slide.
3. Little monster battle mode.
4. Type online chatting (Non VR Mode)
5. Non VR Mode gaming experience.

There are more functions and systems will be released by DLC in near future.
detailed_description:
DNAXCAT VR is a crucial part of DNAXCAT Metaverse.
On this cloud square, there are many little monsters will interactive with you.
We suggest all friends who have seen animation of DNAxCAT to download and play.
In the future, we'll keep refining and developing systems including plots, guilds, territory, forging, collecting, and battle. Moreover, the animation series will be used as the key of storyline

Following basic functions are included in free version.
1. Voice chat in online gaming.
2. Running, Jumping and Rainbow slide.
3. Little monster battle mode.
4. Type online chatting (Non VR Mode)
5. Non VR Mode gaming experience.

There are more functions and systems will be released by DLC in near future.
name: Dnaxcat vr

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windos 10
  • Processor: Intel® i5- 7500
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 1050 / AMD Radeon™
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The VR version requires a VR device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windos 10+
  • Processor: Intel® i5- 7700 or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 1080 / AMD Radeon™ or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The VR version requires a VR device

short_description: In the initial version, apart from chatting, you can also kill time by hunting demented michous. As for the weapons, you can not only choose basic sword but throwables. Before we bring about other functions, please just look upon this place as "cat plaza on the cloud" and have fun!
